channel.title: Et3rnos
channel.description: Web Developer - Discord Bot Developer - CTF Player

item.title: Daily CTF Challenges
item.description:
Daily CTF Challenges is a project designed to make the process of developing and sharing custom CTF challenges on Discord Servers much easier.

Its main features go from an anonymous challenge submission webpage to a simple yet powerful administrator dashboard where you can approve or delete submitted challenges.

Challenge Submission
Admin Panel

The main bot is highly customizable, which means that you can, for example, specify the time when challenges are published and much other things. There is also a realtime leaderboard where top players get custom roles to estimulate players competitivety.

Leaderboard

Other Screenshots

Help
Challenges Release
Attachment Url
I rate the bot 10/10. I love how reliable the bot is now and how little time @Et3rnos took to code it. The code he wrote was elegant and professionally written.
See this bot in action
